presets.name: presets
presets.description:
Initial Gasket preset(s) to use.
Can be set as short name with version (e.g. --presets nextjs@^1.0.0)
Or other (multiple) custom presets (e.g. --presets my-gasket-preset@1.0.0.beta-1,nextjs@^1.0.0)

plugins.name: plugins
plugins.description:
Additional plugin(s) to install. Can be set as
multiple flags (e.g. --plugins jest --plugins zkconfig@^1.0.0)
comma-separated values: --plugins=jest,zkconfig^1.0.0

package-manager.name: package-manager
package-manager.description:
Selects which package manager you would like to use during
 installation. (e.g. --package-manager yarn)

require.name: require
require.description: Require module(s) before Gasket is initialized

bootstrap.name: bootstrap
bootstrap.description: (INTERNAL) If provided, skip the bootstrap phase

generate.name: generate
generate.description: (INTERNAL) If provided, skip the generate phase

npm-link.name: npm-link
npm-link.description:
(INTERNAL) Local packages to be linked. Can be set as
multiple flags (e.g. --npm-link @gasket/plugin-jest --npm-link some-test-preset)
comma-separated values: --npm-link=@gasket/plugin-jest,some-test-preset

preset-path.name: preset-path
preset-path.description:
(INTERNAL) Paths the a local preset packages. Can be absolute
or relative to the current working directory.
comma-separated values: --preset-path=path1,path2

npmconfig.name: npmconfig
npmconfig.description:
(DEPRECATED) .npmrc to be used for npm actions in @gasket/cli'.
Instead, prefer environment variables to configure package managers

config.name: config
config.description: JSON object that provides the values for any interactive prompts

config-file.name: config-file
config-file.description: Path to a JSON file that provides the values for interactive prompts

args.name: appname
args.description: Name of the Gasket application to create
